lyrics:
12 contributorshard to love lyricsverse 1
tell me why when you look me in the eye
do i feel like i want to die
ive been at work all day in the pouring rain
just to give you something youll forget

prechorus
and i would never hate you but youre hard to love
and i would never leave you but youre hard to love

chorus

youre hard to love youre hard to love
but youre hard to love

verse 2
and i dont know why after all this time
every single song i sing is about you
and you walk away you just walk away
but i still make your bed and you still leave me for dead
